did.unittitle: Collection of Copperplate Engravings of Scenes of Work Activities from Diderots Encyclopedia,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: These are eighteenth century book plates from "Diderot's Encyclopedia".

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Collection of Copperplate Engravings of Scenes of Work Activities from Diderots Encyclopedia #5908+ P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Taillanderie, Fabrique des Etaux - Pl. I
Verrerie en bois, Differentes Operations relatives a la facon dun Verre - Pl. 19
Forges, 3 Section, Fourneau en Marchandise, Coulage a la Poche - Pl. IX
Monnoyage, Machine pour la Marque sur tranche - Pl. XVI
Forges, 3 Sedion, Fourneau en Marchandise, Moulage en Sable - Pl. V
Verrerie Francoise en Bouteilles : Verrerie en Charbon de Terre, Four a Bouteilles, et l'Operation de Cueillir le Verre dans le Pot - Pl. I
Verrerie en bois, l'Operation de briser les vieux pots, de les piler et tamiser pour les meler avec la terre glaise et Outils - Pl. VII
